a change

Was not in both of the previous bills is section 18A and 18B and

And what it does do is it closes loop holes so that a business in
North Carolina that has a corporate or parent company outside when
lets say they are going to put a billion dollars in expense whatever
was allocated to North Carolina would be allowed to be expense.
But yet we also reduce that from 30% to 15% otherwise everything
else in this bill has been voted on by the senate and the house.
And I would urge that you pass this bill.
Wish we could have done it last year but it will prove to be beneficial
in helping run the efficiency of
of the Department of Revenue and also our tax policy.
